Sentencas: In order to mitigate the detrimental effect of cathode poisoning induced by Cr in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) metallic interconnects, a potential remedial strategy is to deposit spinel coatings on the surface of the steel for protective purposes.
Titulo: CuFe2O4 nano-spherical powder directly served as interconnect coating for solid oxide fuel cells applications

Sentencas: However, powder-based deposition methods typically require post-treatment at high temperature, which causes severe oxidation reaction and is detrimental to mechanical properties.
Titulo: CuFe2O4 nano-spherical powder directly served as interconnect coating for solid oxide fuel cells applications

Sentencas: In this study, a novel approach is introduced: using a nano-spherical CuFe2O4 spinel powder as a direct coating.
Titulo: CuFe2O4 nano-spherical powder directly served as interconnect coating for solid oxide fuel cells applications

Sentencas: Thanks to its excellent sintering ability, this coating can be applied directly under SOFC working conditions without additional heat treatment.
Titulo: CuFe2O4 nano-spherical powder directly served as interconnect coating for solid oxide fuel cells applications

Sentencas: Characterization techniques like X-ray diffraction (XRD), scanning electron microscopy (SEM), and high-resolution transmission electron microscopy (HR-TEM) confirmed the cubic crystalline phase and nanospherical morphology of CuFe2O4 powder synthesized via the solvothermal method.
Titulo: CuFe2O4 nano-spherical powder directly served as interconnect coating for solid oxide fuel cells applications

Sentencas: Importantly, this powder displayed enhanced sintering capability, reducing the sintering temperature approximately to SOFC operational temperature.
Titulo: CuFe2O4 nano-spherical powder directly served as interconnect coating for solid oxide fuel cells applications

Sentencas: When applied as a protective coating for SUS 430 interconnects, the CuFe2O4 spinel nano-spherical powder demonstrated remarkable effects, including reduced alloy oxidation, mitigated increase in area specific resistance (ASR), and effective prevention of chromium outward diffusion.
Titulo: CuFe2O4 nano-spherical powder directly served as interconnect coating for solid oxide fuel cells applications

Sentencas: As a result, the service life of the SOFC single cell in contact with the CuFe2O4 spinel nano -spherical powder -coated interconnect was significantly prolonged.
Titulo: CuFe2O4 nano-spherical powder directly served as interconnect coating for solid oxide fuel cells applications
